title: Tesla's verschollene Erfindungen - Geniale Techniken wiederentd
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german. English title would be: Tesla&#039;s lost inventions - genial technologies discovered again. It gives you many Tesla&#039;s discoveries which can hardly be found in any physics textbook. Mechanics, electricity, light, high frequency and information technology, free energy.
